Title: Establishes the veteran career assistance program within the SUNY and CUNY systems
Summary: Establishes the veteran career assistance program within the SUNY and CUNY systems to provide veterans with assistance in resume writing and employment placement services.
LawCode: Add ยง5-a, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to the establishment of a veteran career assistance program within the SUNY and CUNY systems
